explains: adj. 教会的；牧师的；神职的

sentences.en: The sovereign holds total power over all the institutions of civilian and ecclesiastical life, holding sway over a kind of peaceable kingdom.
sentences.cn: 君主对平民和教会的所有机构拥有绝对的权力，统治着一个和平的王国。

sentences.en: My ambition was to travel upwards in the ecclesiastical hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 我的雄心是在基督教会体系内步步高升。

sentences.en: Now this was not an official ecclesiastical authority.
sentences.cn: 但这不是正式的教会权威。
